Text:
John Holmes vs. burnt out furry hippies......definitely a classic.

Thanks Frank !
Thanks Frank! Love John Holmes films!

Wow, the first person voice-over narration here is the worst thing ever!   Sometimes the women narrate, going on and on about what it's like to be fucked by John Holmes' Amazing Huge Cock.  Sometimes, Holmes himself narrates, and he too seems to be obsessed about his Amazing Huge Cock.    The voice-over is  so bad it's good, but you might want to turn down the sound, and maybe play some music.  I suggest the Rolling Stones' "Got Live If You Want it".  These were probably silent loops to begin with anyway, before they were compiled here.

Make no mistake, folks, it's a big cock.  And the women are attractive, and natural looking.  Good old fashioned porn... Thanks, Frank!

Hey, it gets better... by which I mean, it gets worse.  !  It occurs to me that all the female voiceovers on this movie are all the same woman speaking in a variety of horrible phoney accents.  The worst is when she accidently gives a British accent to  an Austrailian character.  WOW!
